channel.title: Fromage & Programming
channel.description: A summary of personnal courses/projects providing cheat sheet to help people starting to program in general.

item.title: Torchlurk
item.description: Don't hesitate to visit the official Torchlurk's website or github repo! Key tools: python, pytorch, flask, html/css/javascript, D3.js, Description Torchlurk is a python library allowing you to easily visualize what your sequential CNN has learned by providing various feature such as Grad-CAM, saliency maps or filter visualization directly in a...

item.title: EmoDB Speech Classification
item.description: You can access the presentation here and the github repo here Key tools: python, sklearn, pytorch, speechpy, git Introduction EmoDB, as known as Berlin Database of Emotional Speech, is a dataset presenting short speeches of 6 types of emotions in german. (anger, happiness, fear, disgust, neutral and boredom) The project,...

item.title: Mturk2gform
item.description: You can access the github repo here Key tools: Amazon Mechanical Turk, Google Appscript, docker, python, jupyter ipywidgets Introduction During my semester project at DLAB, I had to synchronize forms generation using Appscript and human labelling resources using amazon MTurk. As no tool allowed to effectively synchronize these two technologies,...

item.title: CheapTorch

item.title: C++ Multithreaded Coencapsulation
item.description: Lab. of Systems Biology and Genetics (EPFL) - Key tools: C++, C++ multithreading,PID controller, microfluidic chips controllers, OpenCv Introduction The goal of the project consisted in coencapsulation of micro-beads of RNA primers with cells into a single drop of lysis buffer using microships: both the cells and the beads would flow through channels A and B respectively. item.title: List of Courses
item.description: This section aims at presenting a non-exhaustive list of the Data Science-related courses that I followed untill and including now during my cursus at EPFL and ETH.
